search_results.snippet:
And the life of luxury Antony leads in Egypt, apparently forsaking his duty, is 
much ... Nay, pray you, seek no colour for your going, ... CLEOPATRA Not now to 
hear thee sing; I take no pleasure ..... He can understand what anyone with any 
military experience can see all too ..... As sweet as balm, as soft as air, as gentle,-
-
